about_the_game:
Blub, blub, sh*thawks! Need some help generating profits on all of your businesses? This fishy pack will get you Orangie and enough Liquor to get make some quick cash. Just don’t pour the booze into the bowl, ok?

Get the Epic Character Card: Orangie
- Orangie gives a cash boost with a 25% cash multiplier on all Businesses.

Get 15 cards for Orangie
- If you have 15 Orangie cards, you can level up Orangie 3 times (if you have enough liquor). For every level, the cash bonus is raised by 20%!

Get 750 Liquor
- With Liquor, you can renovate your Businesses and level up Characters Cards.

(You need to reach season 3 before you can claim your rewards)

Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
